StephenRotation03Start: ^Stephen King: I'm collecting a lot of really good material watching you spin around and talk to everyone.
^Stephen King: Although, I'm unsure if anyone will believe me.
^You: It sounds like you could write about anything and people would be like "that's scary".

c-0: ^You: Losing any one of my jobs. I gotta pay rent, if I can't pay rent I can't play Xbox.
^Stephen King: Do people still play Xbox?
^Stephen King: I'm sure there's plenty of new cool things that are available.
^Stephen King: You know who would play a really good Master Chief?
^Stephen King: I'm glad we're on the same page.
c-1: ^You: I'm not scared of anything. What are you most afraid of?
^Stephen King: Everyone has something to be afraid of.
^You: I worked past that a long time ago.
^Stephen King: I think...I'd have to think a while. Elevators scare me, because you're confined in a metal box.
^Stephen King: Mostly though I have a hard time facing myself. I'm scared of not being able to write and expel my demons. Would they take over?

StephenRotation03End: ^Stephen King: It's funny what scares people these days.
^You: When you live in a capitalist hellscape most things aren't scary anymore.
^Stephen King: At the end of the day, all that's left is you and yourself.
